properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , COMPANY_PRICE , TRADE_COUNT , STATUS , IMG_PATH FROM( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.COMPANY_PRICE , P.TRADE_COUNT , P.STATUS , PIMG.IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT P FULL OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PIMG ON (P.PRODUCT_NAME = PIMG.PRODUCT_NAME) ORDER BY P.TRADE_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND STATUS = 'Y';
